name: SI Made & Product Not Shipped
query:
select dn.name as "DN:Link/Delivery Note:100",dni.serial_no as "SerialNo::100",sii.item_group as "Item Group::100",DATEDIFF(dn.creation,si.creation) as "No of days to ship:Int:140" from `tabSales Invoice` si 
inner join `tabSales Invoice Item` sii on sii.parent=si.name
inner join `tabDelivery Note Item` dni on dni.si_detail=sii.name
inner join `tabDelivery Note` dn on dni.parent=dn.name
where sii.item_group='Laptops' 
 and dni.docStatus=1 and dn.status='Completed' and dn.is_return<>1 and si.docStatus not in (0,2)
 ;
